text: Charles Edward "Charlie" Haden (August 6, 1937 - July 11, 2014) was an American jazz double bass player. He was known for his long association with saxophonist Ornette Coleman, pianist Keith Jarrett, and his Liberation Music Orchestra, a group he co-led with pianist Carla Bley. Haden died in Los Angeles on July 11, 2014 after complications from polio, aged 76.Peteer Hum "RIP, Charlie Haden", Ottawa Citizen, 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== *Heffley. "Haden, Charlie." Grove Music Online. Oxford Music Online. title: Charlie Haden
